snippet.title: VIC-20 + 32k : Pentagorat
snippet.description:
Pentagorat is an isometric adventure for VIC-20 + 32k memory expansion.
Game : Mika Keränen
Loader : Daniel Kahlin

http://www.riimukivi.net

Digital download is now available:

https://misfit.itch.io/

Buy a physical tape release : https://www.thefuturewas8bit.com/shop/commodore/vic-20-games/pg-vic20.html
